name: Monstera Deliciosa
tips: Allow top 2 inches of soil to dry between waterings. Loves humidity.

name: Snake Plant
tips: Very drought tolerant. Water sparingly, especially in winter.

name: Pothos
tips: Thrives on neglect. Great for beginners and low-light areas.

name: Peace Lily
tips: Droops dramatically when thirsty. Toxic to pets.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
tips: Sensitive to changes. Keep in one spot and rotate weekly.

name: Spider Plant
tips: Produces baby plants on runners. Easy to propagate.

name: Aloe Vera
tips: Succulent that stores water. Don't overwater!

name: Boston Fern
tips: Loves humidity. Mist regularly and keep soil moist.

name: Zanzibar Gem
tips: Extremely tolerant of low light and drought. Wipe leaves to keep glossy. Toxic if ingested.

name: Rubber Plant
tips: Likes consistent moisture but don't let sit in water. Wipe large leaves to remove dust. Toxic to pets.

name: Calathea
tips: Keep consistently moist and provide high humidity. Leaves fold at night. Sensitive to fluoride in tap water.

name: English Ivy
light: Medium indirect to bright indirect light
tips: Great for hanging baskets and topiary. Prefers cooler rooms and even moisture. Can be invasive outdoors; toxic to pets.

name: Jade Plant
tips: Slow-growing succulent. Allow soil to dry between waterings. Prune to shape. Mildly toxic to pets.

name: Bird of Paradise
light: Bright light to morning direct sun
tips: Needs bright light to flower. Keep evenly moist during growing season. Large plant that tolerates warm, humid conditions.

name: Rex Begonia
tips: Grown for colorful foliage. Keep soil slightly moist and avoid water on leaves. Prefers high humidity.

name: Hoya (Wax Plant)
tips: Semi-succulent vine that likes to be slightly root-bound. Allow topsoil to dry between waterings. Produces clusters of fragrant waxy flowers.

name: Dracaena Marginata
tips: Tolerant and architectural. Avoid fluoride in water. Wipe leaves occasionally. Toxic to pets.

name: Philodendron Brasil
tips: Fast-growing variegated vine. Trim to encourage bushiness. Toxic to pets.

name: Chinese Money Plant
tips: Likes regular rotation for even growth. Propagates easily from pups. Keep moderately moist.

name: Kalanchoe
tips: Flowering succulent ‚Äî allow soil to dry between waterings and give bright light for best blooms.
